description: From Gulliver's Travels by Jonathan Swift, where Yahoo is the name of a race of brutes.

entries.meaning: (derogatory) A rough, coarse, loud or uncouth person
(cryptozoology) A humanoid cryptid said to exist in parts of eastern Australia, and also reported in the Bahamas.
examples: The natives are greatly terrrified by the sight of a person in a mask calling him "devil" or Yah-hoo, which signifies evil spirit.

verbs.description: yahoo (third-person singular simple present yahoos, present participle yahooing, simple past and past participle yahooed)
yahoo (third-person singular simple present yahoos, present participle yahooing, simple past and past participle yahooed)

entries.meaning: (Internet, informal) To search using the Yahoo! search engine.
examples: Ah! You mean you have been 'yahooing'? I'm dead!
